name: one-eyed Pete (Level 1 & 2)
description:
What's new?

  • Intro with story
  • Grabbing the rope has got much easier and there's also an auto grab feature
  • New art, animation and other minor improvements
  • Another level to play
  • Two endings (Will you get told off by God or is God going to be pleased with you?)
  • Credits screen

Objective

Collect 3 gold coins and kill Captain Silver Tongue

Controls

  • Run - Hold left or right arrow keys
  • Jump - Press space
  • Climb - Press up or down arrow keys
  • (NEW) Auto Grab - Press G to toggle ON or OFF
  • Restart - Press R

CREDITS

Design & Development 

Game Favorites

Artwork 

Mostly by 0x72 from itch.io (I have modified, animated and added a few things, please see the original art from 0x72 for comparison)

Text Font from dafont.com (free to use commercially)

  • N3tRunn3r

Music from pixabay.com (free to use with their license)

  • Hot Music - Level 1
  • The Mountain - Level 2
  • SoundGalleryBy - Credits

Sound effects from freesound.org (CC0 license)

  • Anthousai - footsteps
  • AntumDeluge - parrot squawk
  • Bird_man - swinging anchor
  • Deathscyp - wood break
  • EminYILDIRIM - opening chest
  • GameAudio - restore health
  • Game Favorites - cannonball hit head
  • Isaac200000 - cannon fire
  • Jocabundus - pistol fire
  • Justinvoke - hit by bullet
  • MATRIXXX_ - coin pickup and drowning
  • Mitchanary - anchor strikes sand
  • Mrthenoronha - sword strike
  • Petenice - splash
  • Robinhood76 - heavenly intro
  • Vonz - thunder
  • Yottasounds - cannonball collisions
  • Zepurple - land on sand

Voices recorded by me (no editing or effects were used)

  • God - Game Favorites
  • Pirate - Game Favorites

Warnings

  • Game contains cartoon violence
  • Shows that drinking beer replenishes health (This is not true in the real world)
  • There is some moderate flashing imagery

Recommendations

  • Click on the bottom right corner to play in FULL SCREEN
  • If the game is unresponsive, CLICK INSIDE THE GAME WINDOW

Development Details

This game was made using Construct 3 and it was made for GDKO 2023 - Round 2. The task is to Tell a story using sound.
